overview: Set in a corporate suburb of Texas, Sleepover Mom is a dark comedy about a perfectionist mom who finds out her aloof husband has been cheating on her with a neighborhood acquaintance named Karen. In order to keep her perfect middle-class suburban life, she now has to confront her husband, force him to end his relationship, bury his mistress in the backyard and get back all before her son and his friends wake up for breakfast.
title: SLEEPOVER MOM
